tidbits.title: One Happy Island
tidbits.description: Aruba is known as 'One Happy Island' due to its friendly locals, beautiful beaches, and a laid-back atmosphere, making it a popular destination for relaxation.

tidbits.title: Year-Round Sunshine
tidbits.description: Aruba enjoys a sunny climate year-round with minimal rainfall, offering visitors consistent warmth and perfect conditions for beach activities and water sports.

tidbits.title: Cultural Fusion
tidbits.description: Aruba's culture is a vibrant mix of Dutch influences, indigenous heritage, and Caribbean rhythms, showcased in its music, cuisine, and festivals like Carnival.
